## ðŸš€ Quick Deployment

### 1. Local Development
```bash
# Frontend
npm install && npm start

# Backend (new terminal)
cd backend
pip install -r requirements.txt
python app.py
```

### 2. GitHub Setup
```bash
git init
git add .
git commit -m "AI blog generated by enhanced multi-file coder"
git remote add origin https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/ai-insights-blog.git
git push -u origin main
```

### 3. Netlify Deployment (Frontend)
1. Connect GitHub repository to Netlify
2. Set build command: `npm run build`
3. Set publish directory: `build`
4. Deploy automatically on push

### 4. Backend Deployment
```bash
# Docker deployment
docker build -t ai-blog-api ./backend
docker run -p 5000:5000 ai-blog-api
```
